keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP is the only party that wants control of our borders with a fair even handed immigration system.
Ensure the service is free to UK residents and not front line funding and strip out the bureaucracy created by Labour.
We will keep control of our armed forces, equipment spending in our workforce.
We will keep control of our armed forces, equipment spending in our workforce.
Want government of Britain working constructively and not abandon them when they need us.
Will protect jobs for British workers and finance fishing and farming once we get back control of our country.
Take aid away from foreign governments who use our aid to buy weapons.

issues.health: Ensure the service is free to UK residents and not front line funding and strip out the bureaucracy created by Labour.
issues.immigration: UKIP is the only party that wants control of our borders with a fair even handed immigration system.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want change. I don't want a ministerial car. I want to drive the agenda for YOUR benefit not theirs.

images.caption: Howard Denby UKIP Sheffield Heeley PPC.
